explanations.descriptions: The hashids class contains all the methods for encoding. All parameters are optional
explanations.tips: For encoding you can pass a unique salt value so your hashids differ from everyone else's. I use 'this is my salt' as an example.

explanations.descriptions: Encodes the numbers passed in to look like youtube-style hashes
explanations.tips: Make sure your salt is the same for both encoding and decoding

explanations.descriptions: Decodes a hash created by the encode method
Encodes a hexcode into a hashed string
explanations.tips: The regular encode function doesn't handle strings. encodeHx doesn't work for all strings, however, only hex values
Make sure that this is used in conjuction with encode hex
